title: Who's Playing in the Frosted Flakes box
itunes:title: Who's Playing in the Frosted Flakes box
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to hear what our listeners are doing for extra money if they were recently laid off work. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man who decided to teach his dog how to drive and with all this talk about the Netflix show "Tiger King" it had Charlamagne thinking what else did Joe do to these tigers than just petting?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
